author: gbrown
msg: Change definition of Drawing's size such that it is determined by the bounds of the drawing's canvas rather than explicitly set.

author: ccustine
msg: Maven doesn't like duplicate groupId / artifactId in a single reactor run.

author: marvin
msg: Undo a bunch of temporary hacks, such as commented-out pound-includes.  Fix a
couple latent bugs.  However, after this patch is applied, Lucy won't build
until the rest of LUCY-40 and all of its sub-issues are committed.

author: rmurthy
msg: HIVE-74. Hive can use CombineFileInputFormat for when the input has many
